definition: tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
tube-shaped object/tube/bobbin/(Internet slang) homonym for 同志[tong2 zhi4]

sentences.english: This information will be used to help determine the cement slurry specifications for both the dump bailer and cement packer.
sentences.chinese: 这个信息将用来为倾卸筒和水泥封割器确定泥浆规格。

sentences.english: The ferrule terminal embodiment of the present invention includes a ferrule portion and a barrel portion.
sentences.chinese: 本发明的套圈端子实施例包括套圈部分和筒部分。

sentences.english: Extruder barrel and die temperatures must be set properly for each product.
sentences.chinese: 每样产品的挤出机筒和温度都必须完全的设置好。

sentences.english: Discharging process of slate valve has been studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对旋风筒翻板阀卸料过程进行了分析。

sentences.english: Quail and Foie Gras Lollipops with Leek and wild Mushroom Cannelloni.
sentences.chinese: 鹌鹑伴鸭润入棒筒搭香韭野菇粉卷。

sentences.english: Manually reeve 6 wraps of the 1 inch manila rope onto the drawworks drum.
sentences.chinese: 把一寸的棕绳在绞车辊筒上缠六圈。

sentences.english: The plates around the anchor chain bell mouth and rudder horn shall be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在锚链筒及挂舵臂的外板厚度应予以加强。

sentences.english: Minimize column in the space between the core tube and exterior wall.
sentences.chinese: 核心筒至建筑外墙的空间范围内尽可能考虑没有柱子。

sentences.english: Stick out the tongue and blow it by a hair dryer.
sentences.chinese: 把舌头伸出来用吹风筒吹干。

sentences.english: For example: 13F seat actuator failed to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 第13排F座椅作动筒失效，不能调节。

sentences.english: Best design of grooved drum, good yarn guide and generalized usage.
sentences.chinese: 最佳槽形设计，槽筒具有优良的导纱性能，适应性广。

sentences.english: The assembling stress appears in combined thick wall cylinder because of assemblage excess.
sentences.chinese: 由于过盈配合组合厚壁筒内会产生装配应力。

sentences.english: Overshot parts are usually covered with grease lest they should rust.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦打捞筒配件通常都涂润滑油，以防生锈。

sentences.english: The storage of lead oxide can be done in individual metal drums.
sentences.chinese: 铅粉可以放在单独的金属筒内储存。

sentences.english: Perchloride of iron used to etch gravure cylinders. Alernative term: etchant .
sentences.chinese: 中义腐蚀凹版辊筒的高氯酸铁。

sentences.english: The quick change between flat bed and cylinder arm applications guarantees universal use.
sentences.chinese: 快速转换平板和筒形横臂的应用，确保了用途广泛。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
